Q

query(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.client.Client
In-game command: asks the server for informations about the game
query(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.client.ClientRMI
In-game command: asks the server for informations about the game
query(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.client.ClientSocket
In-game command: asks the server for informations about the game
query(UUID, String) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons.GamesManagerRemote
Recognizes the client sending the query, finds the game it belongs to and delivers it to the controller
query(UUID, String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.server.GamesManager
The first handler of a query, if the client asks for informations about all the games currently hosted on the server then the games manager replies directly, otherwise if it's a query specific to a game we delegate the task to a controller
query(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.gui.ClientMediator
Sends a query to the server through the client object
